text: Database Types E * RDBMS (= SQL / OLTP): RDS, Aurora — great for joins * NoSQL database — no joins, no SQL : DynamoDB (~JSON), ElastiCache (key / value pairs), Neptune (graphs), Document%)B (for MongoDBg, Keyspaces (for Apache Cassandra) * Object Store: S3 (for big objects) / Glacier (for backups / archives) * Data Warehouse (= SQL Analytics / Bl): Redshift (OLAP), Athena, EMR * Search: OpenSearch (JSON) — free text, unstructured searches * Graphs: Amazon Neptune — displays relationships between data * Ledger: Amazon Quantum Ledger Database * Time series: Amazon Timestream
